cont.entity_a: The camera is small enough for travel.
Provides more control than digital devices.
Higher quality results than the Kodak P850.
cont.entity_b: Performs very well for an older pro body.

cont.entity_a: Built-in anti-shake feature is a must-have, superior to expensive lenses. Shake reduction feature is very helpful. Image stabilization feature is very good.

AA battery solution with Sanyo eneloop rechargeables works well without high self-discharge. Some issues with the camera not recognizing batteries, solved with high mAh NiMH batteries. Some users experienced battery life issues with certain types of batteries.

Compatibility.comm: Backwards compatibility with older lenses is excellent.

cont.entity_a: Works with old K lenses if they have electronic dots on the inside ring. Compatible with a wide range of K-mount lenses. Except they are not autofocus.
Features comparable to Nikon and Canon at a fraction of the cost.
cont.entity_b: Best purchased used due to high new price on Amazon.

cont.entity_a: Auto features and modes. Extremely user-friendly.

Durability.comm: Durable and sturdy, lasting many years.

cont.entity_a: 6mp resolution is small by today's standards but offers good value.
Image quality is stunning, superior to many point-and-shoot cameras.
cont.entity_b: Produces sharp 16x24 prints with a good lens. Excellent low ISO performance, producing outstanding images.
Review screen is small compared to newer models.

cont.entity_a: Requires a separate SD memory card purchase.

cont.entity_b: Still a great performer despite newer models like D300, D700, and D3s. Top of the line camera and last of the professional DX cameras.
